name: Get buffers by connection scheme - Negative: Scheme doesn't belong to client

steps.name: assertThat 'java.lang.SecurityException: Connection scheme doesn't belong to the authenticated client'

items.statusDetails:
Expecting throwable message:
  "Connection scheme doesn't belong to the authenticated client"
to contain:
  "Connection scheme doesn't exist or doesn't belong to the authenticated client"
but did not.

Throwable that failed the check:
